name: inticons
description: Icons library and toolkit built by INTEGRATION Corp.
author: INTEGRATION Corp.

scripts.dependency: npm install && cd ./docs && npm install && cd ..
scripts.fontello: node ./build/fontello && rm -rf .fontello-session && fontello-cli install --config ./fonts/config.json --css ./fonts/css --font ./fonts/font && rm -rf .fontello-session && fontello-cli install --config ./fonts/untitled-ui-config.json --css ./fonts/css --font ./fonts/font
scripts.build-docs: node ./build/build-docs && cd ./docs && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run fontello && npm run build-font && npm run build-docs
